text.name: longdescription
text.text: Successor to the N64. The first Nintendo console to use optical discs. CPU IBM PowerPC 750CXe Gekko @486MHz, mem card 16MB max, GPU ATI Flipper @162MHz, Sound Analog stereo (Dolby Pro Logic II). Release date JP: 14 Sep '01 NA: 18 Nov '01 EU: 03 May '02 AU: 17 May '02.
